definitions.definition: A cereal of the species Hordeum vulgare , or its grains, often used as food or to make beer and other malted drinks.
The seed of Job's tears . ( Coix lacryma-jobi )

main_definition: A cereal of the species Hordeum vulgare , or its grains, often used as food or to make beer and other malted drinks.
secondary_definitions: ( Singapore ) The seed of Job's tears . ( Coix lacryma-jobi )
